text: Kodwa Sathi Sisakumisela ukufa kuye (uSulaym√¢n) akwabikho nto izichazelayo ngokufa kwakhe ngaphandle komsundululu womhlaba owawumana ugrenya umsimelelo wakhe Wathi akuwa phantsi, (kwangona) zibonayo iiJinni okokuba ukuba zazikwazi okungabonwayo, ngezazingazanga zihlale (phantsi) kwesohlwayo sokudeleka (okungako)
